params.name: loss
params.type: optional, returned when labels is provided, torch.FloatTensor of shape (1,)
params.description: Total loss as the sum of the masked language modeling loss and the next sequence prediction(classification) loss.

params.name: prediction_logits
params.description: Prediction scores of the language modeling head (scores for each vocabulary token before SoftMax).

params.name: seq_relationship_logits
params.description: Prediction scores of the next sequence prediction (classification) head (scores of True/False continuationbefore SoftMax).

params.name: hidden_states
params.description: Tuple of torch.FloatTensor (one for the output of the embeddings + one for the output of each layer) ofshape (batch_size, sequence_length, hidden_size).Hidden-states of the model at the output of each layer plus the initial embedding outputs.

params.name: attentions
params.description: Tuple of torch.FloatTensor (one for each layer) of shape (batch_size, num_heads, sequence_length, sequence_length).Attentions weights after the attention softmax, used to compute the weighted average in the self-attentionheads.
